[
  {
    HintName: GeneratedEndpoints.g.cs,
    Source:
// <auto-generated/>
using System.Collections.Generic;
using Microsoft.AspNetCore.Builder;
using Microsoft.AspNetCore.Http;
using Microsoft.AspNetCore.Routing;
using Stratify.MinimalEndpoints;

namespace TestNamespace
{
    partial class CreateUserEndpoint : IEndpoint
    {
        public void MapEndpoint(IEndpointRouteBuilder app)
        {
            app.MapPost("/api/users", Handle)
                .WithTags("Users", "Admin")
                .WithName("CreateUser")
                .WithSummary("Creates a new user")
                .WithDescription("Creates a new user in the system with the provided details")
                .RequireAuthorization()
                .RequireAuthorization("AdminPolicy")
                .RequireAuthorization(policy => policy.RequireRole("Administrator", "UserManager"))
                ;
        }
    }
}


  }
]
